verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] approved tariffs on Chinese goods worth about $ 50 billion , said a person familiar with the decision , ratcheting up a confrontation on trade with Beijing and triggering losses in the domestic stock market .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: approved] [ARG1: tariffs on Chinese goods worth about $ 50 billion] , said a person familiar with the decision , ratcheting up a confrontation on trade with Beijing and triggering losses in the domestic stock market .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump has approved tariffs on Chinese goods worth about $ 50 billion] , [V: said] [ARG0: a person familiar with the decision] , [ARGM-ADV: ratcheting up a confrontation on trade with Beijing and triggering losses in the domestic stock market] .

President Donald Trump has approved tariffs on Chinese goods worth about $ 50 billion , said [ARG0: a person familiar with the decision] , [V: ratcheting] up [ARG1: a confrontation on trade with Beijing] and triggering losses in the domestic stock market .

President Donald Trump has approved tariffs on Chinese goods worth about $ 50 billion , said [ARG0: a person familiar with the decision] , ratcheting up a confrontation on trade with Beijing and [V: triggering] [ARG1: losses in the domestic stock market] .
